address: 811 Wilshire Blvd, 17th Floor, Los Angeles, CA 90017
valueProp:
Rager & Yoon - Employment Lawyers is a highly reputable law firm in Los Angeles specializing in employment law, wrongful termination, workplace discrimination, and whistleblower cases. With a team of experienced attorneys led by Jeffrey Rager, they have a track record of successfully representing clients in complex legal matters. The firm is known for its aggressive and comprehensive approach to protecting the rights of employees who have been wronged by their employers.

Rager & Yoon - Employment Lawyers is dedicated to providing personalized legal representation to each client, ensuring they are informed and supported throughout the legal process. With a focus on achieving justice and fair compensation for their clients, the firm has earned a reputation for excellence in the field of employment law. Their commitment to fighting for the rights of employees sets them apart as a trusted and reliable legal resource for those facing workplace injustices.
